TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Legend extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图表图像的图例。

span.span: Represents the legend for the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装控件图例的所有功能, 并使用根对象的集合属性公开。 The class encapsulates all the functionality of the control's legend, and is exposed using the collection property of the root object. 可以有任意数量的图表图像的图例。There can be any number of legends for a chart image. 图例可以:Legends can: - 停靠并对齐。Be docked and aligned. - 显示在绘制的图表区的内部或外部。Be displayed inside or outside the plotted chart areas. - 自动调整其内容。Automatically fit their contents. - 使用预定义的样式, 例如行、列或表。Use a predefined style, such as row, column or table. - 使用阴影、渐变颜色和背景图像。Use hatching, gradient colors and background images. - 调整大小并放置在图表图像中的任意位置。Be sized and positioned anywhere within the chart image. 图例项由对象表示, 它们为默认项或自定义项。Legend items are represented by the object, and are either default or custom items. 自定义项不与数据关联, 可以使用属性添加、删除和修改自定义项。Custom items are not associated with data, and can be added, deleted and modified using the property. 默认项默认情况下自动添加到图例, 是圆环图和饼图的绘图数据点的名称。Default items are by default automatically added to the legend, and are the names of the plotted data points for doughnut and pie charts. 对于所有其他图表类型, 默认项为绘制的数据序列的名称。For all other chart types, the default items are the names of the plotted data series. 每个序列都有一个属性, 该属性定义将使用的图例的名称。Each series has a property that defines the name of the legend that will be used. 如果将属性设置为`false`, 则不会为序列创建图例项。A legend item will not be created for a series if the property is set to `false`. 可以使用属性更改这些默认项的文本。The text for these default items can be changed using the property. 此属性将允许您指定将在运行时替换为其相应值的预定义关键字。This property will allow you to specify predefined keywords that will be replaced by their appropriate values at run-time. 如果您有一个饼图并且您设置了该属性, 它还会将图例文本设置为您为标签设置的值。If you have a pie chart and you set the property, it will also set the legend text to the value you set for the labels. 如果要将文本设置为其他值, 可以设置属性。If you want to set the text to a different value, you can set the property. 在大多数情况下, 您需要将属性设置为 "#AXISLABEL" 或 "#VALX"。In most cases, you would want to set the property to "#AXISLABEL" or "#VALX". 图例系列符号是矩形、点或线条。Legend series symbols are rectangles, dots or lines. 符号类型由图表自动设置, 并且取决于绘制的图表类型。The symbol type is set automatically by the chart and depends on the plotted chart type. 默认情况下, 图例文本会自动调整大小。Legend text by default is automatically sized. 可以通过禁用属性来禁用图例文本的自动调整大小。You can disable automatic sizing of legend text by disabling the property. 当此属性设置为`false`时, 图例文本的大小由图例的大小属性确定。When this property is set to `false`, the size of the legend text is determined by the Size property of the legend . 如果该属性已启用, 则属性确定在调整大小时图例项可以具有的最小字体大小。If the property is enabled, the property determines the minimum font size that a legend item can have when resizing. 属性定义在将文本包装到另一行之前, 可在一行上显示的字符数的限制。The property defines a limit on the number of characters that can be shown on one line before text is wrapped to another line. 如果您不希望在图例中自动换行, 请将属性的值设置为零。If you do not wish to wrap text in the legend, set the value of the property to zero. 默认情况下, 当图例中的整个图例文本不符合时, 文本将被截断。By default, when the entire legend text does not fit in the legend, the text will be truncated. 您可以将图例上的设置为, 以使文本换行, 而不是被截断。You can set the on the legend to get the text to wrap instead of being truncated. 如果图例的内容无法放入给定空间, 则图例项将被截断。If the contents of the legend cannot fit into the given space, legend entries are truncated. 将显示一个省略号, 指示有多个条目超出了图例的空间。An ellipsis is shown to indicate that there are more entries than the legend has space for. 若要防止图例项被截断, 请使用属性设置图例的位置和大小。To prevent the legend items from being truncated, set the position and size of the legend using the property. 设置图例位置或大小时, 图表不能再自动定位图表中的元素。When setting the legend position or size, the chart can no longer automatically position the elements in the chart. 在某些情况下, 您需要手动定位其他图表元素以实现所需的外观。In some cases, you many need to manually position other chart elements to achieve the desired appearance. 另一种方法是定义自己的单元列, 而不是使用默认图例设置。Another option would be to define your own cell columns instead of using the default legend settings. 对象具有 CellColumn 集合; 每个 CellColumn 对象表示图例中的一个列。The object has a CellColumn Collection; each CellColumn object represents a column in the Legend. 单元列具有和属性, 可以用来调整列的大小。A cell column has and properties that can be used to adjust the size of the columns. 当图例包含许多条目时, 可以使用来提高可读性。When the legend contains many entries, can be used to improve readability. 当此属性设置为 True 时, 它将显示可以使用属性设置的背景色。When this property is set to True, it will display a back color that you can set using the property. 默认情况下, 图例放置在图表的右上角。By default, the legend is positioned in the top-right corner of the chart. 此位置可以使用图例的和属性进行修改。This position can be modified by using the and properties of the legend. 还可以通过使用属性, 将图例与图表区相关联。The legend can also be associated with a chart area by use of the property. 此属性指定图例应停靠的图表区的名称。This property specifies the name of the chart area for which the legend should be docked. 此外, 属性还可用于在图表区域中显示图例。In addition, the property can be used to display the legend inside a chart area. 当设置为 False 时 , 属性将定义图例自动定位时可用图表中图例的最大大小 (以百分比表示)。When is set to False, the property defines the maximum size, in percent, of the legend within the available chart when the legend is automatically positioned. 如果在设置停靠属性后要调整图例的宽度或高度, 应设置此属性。This property should be set if you wish to adjust the width or height of the legend after the docking properties have been set. 可以使用事件修改图例。The legend can be modified using the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 一个 .NET Framework 枚举值，该值表示图例的对齐方式。

span.span: A .NET Framework enumeration value that represents the alignment of the legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图例可以对齐, 以使其为或 ; 它的对齐方式也受属性设置的影响。The legend can be aligned so that it is , or ; its alignment is also affected by the property setting. 如果图例停靠在顶部或底部, 则为左侧; 如果停靠在左侧或右侧, 则为顶部。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, is to the left; if it is docked to the left or right, is at the top. 属性设置就是相反的, 根据其停靠位置, 将图例向右或向下对齐。The property setting is just the opposite, and aligns the legend to the right or the bottom, depending on where it is docked. 始终将图例垂直或水平居中。 always centers the legend, either vertically or horizontally. 如果属性未设置为, 则设置属性将不起作用。 Setting the property will have no effect if the property is not set to .

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum font size that can be used by the autofitting algorithm for the legend text.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示最小字号。

span.span: An value that represents the minimum font size.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，表示图例的背景色。

span.span: A value that represents the background color of a legend.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果为背景指定了渐变颜色, 则该值将为第一个使用的颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制颜色的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为 "透明"-也就是说, 如果使用的 alpha 值为 0, 则不会将颜色分配给图例的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - that is, if you use an alpha value of 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the legend. 因此, 背景将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景渐变方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示图例的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the orientation for the background gradient of a legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定图例是否将显示渐变, 并确定渐变的方向 (如果使用)。Use the property to determine whether a legend will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表, 请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 使用渐变颜色:To use gradient colors: 将图例背景的主要颜色设置为属性。Set the primary color of the legend background with the property. 将图例背景的辅助颜色设置为属性。Set the secondary color of the legend background with the property. 将此属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的阴影类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举，表示图例的阴影类型。

span.span: A enumeration that represents the hatching style of a legend.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定类型的画笔使用的阴影模式。 The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影模式包含纯色背景色和在背景上绘制的线条。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用阴影样式的列表, 请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. **注意**阴影线的颜色由属性确定。**Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义图例的背景图像路径, 可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像, 请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 还可以通过设置属性, 将图像显示的一种颜色指定为 "透明"。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像可以来自 .NET Framework 支持的任何有效图形文件, 包括图标。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性, 如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the drawing mode.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，表示背景图像对齐方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the background image alignment.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图例的背景图像的对齐方式;仅当属性设置为时才应用此设置。This property determines the alignment of the background image for the legend; it is only applied when the property is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of a legend background image.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，表示图例背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the drawing mode of a legend background image.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定图像的显示方式; 图像可以平铺、缩放等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像, 则该图像将进行拉伸以适合图例边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the legend. 如果图像已平铺, 则从图例的左上角开始, 重复绘制图像。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the legend. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息, 请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果将属性设置为, 则绘制图像的位置由属性设置确定。 If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定许多对象的辅助背景色, 并在应用渐变颜色时使用。 The property determines the secondary background color of many objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以将设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影, 则属性确定图例的阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend. 若要为图例的背景使用渐变颜色:To use gradient colors for the background of a legend: - 用属性设置主色。Set the primary color with the property. - 用属性设置辅助颜色。Set the secondary color with the property. - 将属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of a legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定图表元素的边框样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定要用于边框的线条样式。The property determines the line style to use for a border. 该行可以是纯色、点线等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 有关其他边框样式, 请参阅枚举主题。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的边框宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of a legend.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定图例边框的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意, 属性还可以将此类元素中的线条宽度设置为折线图、以 "line" 样式显示的自定义图例项等。 Note that property can also set the width of lines in such elements as line charts, custom legend items displayed with a "line" style, and so forth.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以停靠到整个图表图像的顶部、左侧、底部或右侧, 或者位于图表区域的内部或外部。The can be docked to the top, left, bottom or right of either the entire chart image, or the inside or outside of a chart area. `false`如果将属性设置为, 则停靠适用于整个图表图像。If the property is set to `false`, docking applies to the entire chart image. 如果将`true` 属性设置为, 则停靠适用于属性指定的对象If the property is set to `true`, docking applies to the object specified by the property 如果属性未设置为, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the property is not set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试在运行时更改此对象的属性, 则会发生编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性, 必须创建一个新的对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置了 "图例" 的 "Size" 属性, 则属性将设置为 false。If you set the Legend.Font.Size property, the property will be set to false. 此外, 如果将属性设置为 true, 则此属性将重置为其默认值, 即8磅。Also, if you set the property to true, this property will be reset to its default, which is 8 points.

summary.span: 此属性仅对自动添加到图表序列中的图例项有效；对自定义图例项无效。

span.span: This property only affects legend items automatically added for the chart series; it has no effect on custom legend items.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，用于指定图例项显示顺序。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the order in which legend items are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性设置为, 则在使用 StackedColumn、StackedColumn100、StackedArea 或 StackedArea100 图表类型时, 图例会自动反转。If the property is set to , the legend will automatically be reversed if StackedColumn, StackedColumn100, StackedArea or StackedArea100 chart types are used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle LegendStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the legend.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值可确定图例样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the legend style.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 图例显示为表中的一系列项。By default, the legend is displayed as a series of items in a table. 您可以通过设置属性来指定是按横向还是按高度展开表中的项。You can specify whether to expand items in the table width-wise or height-wise by setting the property. 当属性设置为时, 控件将根据图表的对齐方式和位置确定是绘制宽表还是表高。 When the property is set to , the control will determine whether to draw a wide table or a tall table, depending on the alignment and positioning of the chart. 这可能会导致使用多个图例项列绘制图例。This may cause the legend to be drawn using multiple legend item columns. 有三种可能的图例样式:列、行和表。There are three possible styles for a legend: Column, Row and Table. 请参阅下表, 了解以下样式的摘要:Refer to the table below for a summary of these styles: |样式Style|说明Description| |-|-| |列Column|图例项显示在一列中, 具有多个行。Legend items are displayed in one column, with multiple rows. 当图例停靠在图表的左侧或右侧时最常使用。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart.| |行Row|图例项显示在一行中, 其中包含多个列。Legend items are displayed in one row, with multiple columns. 在图例停靠到图表的顶部或底部时最常使用。Most commonly used when the legend is docked to the top or bottom of the chart.| |表Table|使用多列和多行显示图例项。Legend items are displayed using multiple columns and rows.|

summary.span: 获取或设置图例的最大大小（以图表区域的百分比形式表示）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the legend, measured as a percentage of the chart area.

summary.span: 此值由自动布局算法使用。

span.span: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.

value.span: 一个值, 该值表示图例的最大大小。

span.span: A value that represents the maximum size of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图例停靠在图表区的左侧或右侧, 此属性将确定图例的最大宽度, 以图表区域的百分比度量。If the legend is docked to the left or right of the chart area, this property determines the maximum width of the legend, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area. 如果图例停靠在顶部或底部, 则此属性将确定图例的最大高度 (以百分比表示)。If the legend is docked to the top or bottom, this property determines the maximum height of the legend, which is also measured as a percentage.

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于获取或设置图例位置的 对象。

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例的位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性自动设置（即 Legend.Position.Auto = `true`）由 控件计算的图例位置，则考虑 、 和 属性设置。If the property is automatic (that is, Legend.Position.Auto = `true`) the legend position is calculated automatically by the control, taking into account the , and property settings. 如果不自动设置，则将忽略 、 和 属性，图例位置仅由返回的 对象的值确定。If it is not automatic, the , and properties are ignored, and the legend position is solely determined by the value of the returned object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现 "真实" 阴影效果;对于阴影, 尝试使用颜色值 "128, 0, 0, 0"。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影, 请将属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏, 请将此属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, set this property to a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下和向右移动;负值将导致阴影向左移动和向左移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right; a negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当属性设置为时, 此属性才适用。This property is only applicable if the property is set to .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置可在文本换行前在图例中连续显示的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters that can be sequentially displayed in the legend before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示在文本换行前可在图例中连续显示的字符数。

span.span: An value that represents the number of characters that can be placed in the legend sequentially before the text is wrapped.

value.span: 默认值为 25。

span.span: The default value is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图例文本超出了此属性指定的值, 则当遇到下一个空白字符时, 将自动换行文本。When the legend text exceeds the value specified by this property, text will be automatically wrapped when the next white-space character is encountered. 如果文本中没有空白字符, 则不会换行。Text will not be wrapped if there are no white-space characters in the text. 将属性设置为零可禁用该功能。Set the property to zero to disable the feature.
